Financial Capacity Instrument Short Form (FCI-SF)

Source: R/data.R
FCI.Rd

Financial Capacity Instrument Short Form (FCI-SF) data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(FCI)

Format

A data frame with 2624 observations and 70 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with factor levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Range value: 2, ..., 7125

  • VISCODE character , with options: init, bl, y1, y2, y4, y3, y5

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • VISDATE Registry EXAMDATE on matching VISCODE Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • MC_SCORE numeric Mental Calculation Score (Items 1-2) 0..4

  • FC_SCORE numeric Financial Conceptual Knowledge Score (Items 3-6) 0..8

  • SNGLCHKSCORE numeric Single/Checkbook Register Score (Items 7-16): 0..20

  • COMPLXCHKSCORE numeric Complex Checkbook/Register Score (Items 17-30): 0..28

  • CHKCOMPOSTIME numeric Checkbook/Register Composite Time (Items 7-16 & 17-30): 0..540

  • CHKCOMPOSSCORE numeric Combined Checkbook/Register Score (Items 7-16 + 17-30 ): 0..48

  • BANKSTATSCORE numeric Bank Statement Management Score (Items 31-37): 0..14

  • TOTCOMPTIME numeric TOTAL Composite Time (Items 4, 5, 7-16, 17-30): 0..720

  • FCISCORE numeric TOTAL FCI-SF SCORE: 0..74

  • DONE character Was assessment/procedure done? 0=No;1=Yes Decoded Value: Yes

  • NDREASON character If No, reason not done 1=Participant Unable for Cognitive Reasons;2=Participant Unable for Other Reasons (Physical, auditory, etc.);3=Participant/Study Partner Refused;4=Equipment related issue;7=Site Error;8=Other Reason;9=Unknown Decoded Value: Yes

  • NICKELS character 1. Nickels 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • QUARTERS character 2. Quarters 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BUDGET character 3. Budget 0=0;1=1;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • EXPMEDINS character Experience with Medical Insurance Plan? 0=No;1=Yes Decoded Value: Yes

  • INSURANCE character 4. Health Care Insurance Problem 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • MEDINSTIME numeric Time to complete Item 4 Range value: 0, ..., 90

  • EXPINCTAX character Experience with Income Taxes? 0=No;1=Yes Decoded Value: Yes

  • TAXCREDA character 5. a. Tax Credit 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • QUES5TIME numeric Time to complete Item 5.a. Range value: 0, ..., 40

  • TAXCREDB character 5. b. Tax Credit 0=0;1=1;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • EXPCHECKREG character Experience with Checkbook/Check Register? 0=No;1=Yes Decoded Value: Yes

  • PAYEE character 6. Payee 0=0;1=1;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK7 character 7. Payee section 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK8 character 8. $ amount section (numerical) 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK9 character 9. $ amount section (written) 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK10 character 10. Signature of payer 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK11 character 11. Date properly written 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK12 character 12. Number of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK13 character 13. Date properly entered 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK14 character 14. Payee section 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK15 character 15. Amount of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHK16 character 16. New account balance 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • SNGLCHKTIME numeric Time to complete items 7-16 Range value: 1, ..., 240

  • COMPLXCHK17 character 17. Number of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK18 character 18. Date properly entered 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK19 character 19. Payee section 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK20 character 20. Amount of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK21 character 21. New Account Balance 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK22 character 22. Number of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK23 character 23. Date properly entered 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK24 character 24. Payee section 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK25 character 25. Amount of check 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK26 character 26. New Account Balance 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK27 character 27. Date properly entered 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK28 character 28. Description of Transaction 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK29 character 29. Amount of deposit 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHK30 character 30. New account balance 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • COMPLXCHKTIME numeric Time to complete Items 17-30 Range value: 1, ..., 300

  • BANKSTATA character 31. a. Bank Statement 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTATB character 31. b. Bank Statement 0=0;1=1;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • EXPBANKSTATE character Experience with Bank Statement? 0=No;1=Yes Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT32 character 32. Interest Rate 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT33 character 33. Time Period 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT34 character 34. Checks Cleared 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT35 character 35. Quarterly Interest 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT36 character 36. Gaps in Check Sequence 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • BANKSTAT37 character 37. Date of the Withdrawal Payment 0=0;2=2;99=OT Decoded Value: Yes

  • ID numeric Range value: 12, ..., 186217

  • SITEID numeric Range value: 1, ..., 63

  • USERDATE Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • update_stamp POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
